# GitHub Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files.

## AI Agent Instructions

### GitHub Copilot

- **`.github/copilot-instructions.md`** - Main instructions file for GitHub Copilot
  - Copilot automatically reads this file when working in this repository
  - Contains rules for creating AWS documentation
  - Follows GitHub's official standard location

### Alternative Locations

For path-specific instructions, you can create files in:

- `.github/instructions/` - For instructions that apply to specific file patterns

## Workflows

See `.github/workflows/` for CI/CD workflows.

## Prompts

See `.github/prompts/` for OpenSpec-related prompts.
